patches.name: Alternative thumbnails
patches.description: Adds options to replace video thumbnails using the DeArrow API or image captures from the video.

patches.name: Bypass URL redirects
patches.description: Adds an option to bypass URL redirects and open the original URL directly.

patches.name: Bypass certificate checks
patches.description: Bypasses certificate checks which prevent YouTube Music from working on Android Auto.

patches.name: Bypass image region restrictions
patches.description: Adds an option to use a different host for user avatar and channel images and can fix missing images that are blocked in some countries.

patches.name: Change form factor
patches.description: Adds an option to change the UI appearance to a phone, tablet, or automotive device.

patches.name: Change header
patches.description: Adds an option to change the header logo in the top left corner of the app.

options.title: Custom header logo
options.description:
Folder with images to use as a custom header logo.

The folder must contain one or more of the following folders, depending on the DPI of the device:
- drawable-hdpi
- drawable-xhdpi
- drawable-xxhdpi
- drawable-xxxhdpi

Each of the folders must contain all of the following files:
morphe_header_custom_light.png
morphe_header_custom_dark.png 

The image dimensions must be as follows:
- drawable-hdpi: 194x72 px
- drawable-xhdpi: 258x96 px
- drawable-xxhdpi: 387x144 px
- drawable-xxxhdpi: 512x192 px

patches.name: Change miniplayer color
patches.description: Adds an option to change the miniplayer background color to match the fullscreen player.

patches.name: Change package name
patches.description: Appends ".morphe" to the package name by default. Changing the package name of the app can lead to unexpected issues.

options.title: Package name
options.description: The name of the package to rename the app to.

options.title: Update permissions
options.description: Update compatibility receiver permissions. Enabling this can fix installation errors, but this can also break features in certain apps.

options.title: Update providers
options.description: Update provider names declared by the app. Enabling this can fix installation errors, but this can also break features in certain apps.

patches.name: Change start page
patches.description: Adds an option to set which page the app opens in instead of the homepage.

patches.name: Check watch history domain name resolution
patches.description: Checks if the device DNS server is preventing user watch history from being saved.

patches.name: Check watch history domain name resolution
patches.description: Checks if the device DNS server is preventing user watch history from being saved.

patches.name: Copy video URL
patches.description: Adds options to display buttons in the video player to copy video URLs.

patches.name: Custom branding
patches.description: Adds options to change the app icon and app name. Branding cannot be changed for mounted (root) installations.

options.title: Custom icon
options.description:
Folder with images to use as a custom icon.

The folder must contain one or more of the following folders, depending on the DPI of the device:
- mipmap-mdpi
- mipmap-hdpi
- mipmap-xhdpi
- mipmap-xxhdpi
- mipmap-xxxhdpi

Each of the folders must contain all of the following files:
morphe_adaptive_background_custom.png
morphe_adaptive_foreground_custom.png

The image dimensions must be as follows:
- mipmap-mdpi: 108x108 px
- mipmap-hdpi: 162x162 px
- mipmap-xhdpi: 216x216 px
- mipmap-xxhdpi: 324x324 px
- mipmap-xxxhdpi: 432x432 px

Optionally, the path contains a 'drawable' folder with any of the monochrome icon files:
morphe_adaptive_monochrome_custom.xml
morphe_notification_icon_custom.xml

patches.name: Custom branding
patches.description: Adds options to change the app icon and app name. Branding cannot be changed for mounted (root) installations.

options.title: Custom icon
options.description:
Folder with images to use as a custom icon.

The folder must contain one or more of the following folders, depending on the DPI of the device:
- mipmap-mdpi
- mipmap-hdpi
- mipmap-xhdpi
- mipmap-xxhdpi
- mipmap-xxxhdpi

Each of the folders must contain all of the following files:
morphe_adaptive_background_custom.png
morphe_adaptive_foreground_custom.png

The image dimensions must be as follows:
- mipmap-mdpi: 108x108 px
- mipmap-hdpi: 162x162 px
- mipmap-xhdpi: 216x216 px
- mipmap-xxhdpi: 324x324 px
- mipmap-xxxhdpi: 432x432 px

Optionally, the path contains a 'drawable' folder with any of the monochrome icon files:
morphe_adaptive_monochrome_custom.xml
morphe_notification_icon_custom.xml

patches.name: Custom player overlay opacity
patches.description: Adds an option to change the opacity of the video player background when player controls are visible.

patches.name: Disable auto captions
patches.description: Adds an option to disable captions from being automatically enabled.

patches.name: Disable double tap actions
patches.description: Adds an option to disable player double tap gestures.

patches.name: Disable fullscreen ambient mode
patches.description: Adds an option to disable the ambient mode when in fullscreen.

patches.name: Disable haptic feedback
patches.description: Adds an option to disable haptic feedback in the player for various actions.

patches.name: Disable player popup panels
patches.description: Adds an option to disable panels (such as live chat) from opening automatically.

patches.name: Disable resuming Shorts on startup
patches.description: Adds an option to disable the Shorts player from resuming on app startup when Shorts were last being watched.

patches.name: Disable rolling number animations
patches.description: Adds an option to disable rolling number animations of video view count, user likes, and upload time.

patches.name: Disable sign in to TV popup
patches.description: Adds an option to disable the popup asking to sign into a TV on the same local network.

patches.name: Disable video codecs
patches.description: Adds options to disable HDR and VP9 codecs.

patches.name: Downloads
patches.description: Adds support to download videos with an external downloader app using the in-app download button or a video player action button.

patches.name: Enable debugging
patches.description: Adds options for debugging and exporting Morphe logs to the clipboard.

patches.name: Enable debugging
patches.description: Adds options for debugging and exporting Morphe logs to the clipboard.

patches.name: Enable exclusive audio playback
patches.description: Enables the option to play audio without video.

patches.name: Exit fullscreen mode
patches.description: Adds options to automatically exit fullscreen mode when a video reaches the end.

patches.name: Force original audio
patches.description: Adds an option to always use the original audio track.

patches.name: Force original audio
patches.description: Adds an option to always use the original audio track.

patches.name: GmsCore support
patches.description: Allows the app to work without root by using a different package name when patched using a GmsCore instead of Google Play Services.

options.title: GmsCore vendor group ID
options.description: The vendor's group ID for GmsCore.

patches.name: GmsCore support
patches.description: Allows the app to work without root by using a different package name when patched using a GmsCore instead of Google Play Services.

options.title: GmsCore vendor group ID
options.description: The vendor's group ID for GmsCore.

patches.name: Hide 'Get Music Premium'
patches.description: Adds an option to hide the "Get Music Premium" label in the settings and account menu.

patches.name: Hide Shorts components
patches.description: Adds options to hide components related to Shorts. Patching version 20.21.37 or lower can hide more Shorts player button types.

options.title: Hide Shorts app shortcut
options.description: Permanently hides the shortcut to open Shorts when long pressing the app icon in your launcher.

options.title: Hide Shorts widget
options.description: Permanently hides the launcher widget Shorts button.

patches.name: Hide ads
patches.description: Adds options to remove general ads.

patches.name: Hide buttons
patches.description: Adds options to hide the cast, history, notification, and search buttons.

patches.name: Hide category bar
patches.description: Adds an option to hide the category bar at the top of the homepage.

patches.name: Hide end screen cards
patches.description: Adds an option to hide suggested video cards at the end of videos.

patches.name: Hide end screen suggested video
patches.description: Adds an option to hide the suggested video at the end of videos.

patches.name: Hide info cards
patches.description: Adds an option to hide info cards that creators add in the video player.

patches.name: Hide layout components
patches.description: Adds options to hide general layout components.

patches.name: Hide music video ads
patches.description: Adds an option to hide ads that appear while listening to or streaming music videos, podcasts, or songs.

patches.name: Hide player flyout menu items
patches.description: Adds options to hide menu items that appear when pressing the gear icon in the video player.

patches.name: Hide player overlay buttons
patches.description: Adds options to hide the player Cast, Autoplay, Captions, Previous & Next buttons, and the player control buttons background.

patches.name: Hide related video overlay
patches.description: Adds an option to hide the related video overlay shown when swiping up in fullscreen.

patches.name: Hide timestamp
patches.description: Adds an option to hide the timestamp in the bottom left of the video player.

patches.name: Hide video action buttons
patches.description: Adds options to hide action buttons (such as the Download button) under videos. Patching version 20.21.37 or lower can hide more player button types.

patches.name: Loop video
patches.description: Adds an option to loop videos and display loop video button in the video player.

patches.name: Miniplayer
patches.description: Adds options to change the in-app minimized player.

patches.name: Navigation bar
patches.description: Adds options to hide navigation bar, labels and buttons.

patches.name: Navigation buttons
patches.description: Adds options to hide and change navigation buttons (such as the Shorts button).

patches.name: Open Shorts in regular player
patches.description: Adds options to open Shorts in the regular video player.

patches.name: Open links externally
patches.description: Adds an option to always open links in your browser instead of the in-app browser.

patches.name: Open videos fullscreen
patches.description: Adds an option to open videos in full screen portrait mode.

patches.name: Permanent repeat
patches.description: Adds an option to always repeat even if the playlist ends or another track is played.

patches.name: Playback speed
patches.description: Adds options to customize available playback speeds, set a default playback speed, and show a speed dialog button in the video player.

patches.name: Remove background playback restrictions
patches.description: Removes restrictions on background playback, including playing kids videos in the background.

patches.name: Remove background playback restrictions
patches.description: Removes restrictions on background playback, including playing kids videos in the background.

patches.name: Remove viewer discretion dialog
patches.description: Adds an option to remove the dialog that appears when opening a video that has been age-restricted by accepting it automatically. This does not bypass the age restriction.

patches.name: Return YouTube Dislike
patches.description: Adds an option to show the dislike count of videos with Return YouTube Dislike.

patches.name: Sanitize sharing links
patches.description: Removes the tracking query parameters from shared links.

patches.name: Sanitize sharing links
patches.description: Removes the tracking query parameters from shared links.

patches.name: Seekbar
patches.description: Adds options to disable precise seeking when swiping up on the seekbar, slide to seek instead of playing at 2x speed when pressing and holding, tapping the player seekbar to seek, and hiding the video player seekbar.

patches.name: Shorts autoplay
patches.description: Adds options to automatically play the next Short.

patches.name: SponsorBlock
patches.description: Adds options to enable and configure SponsorBlock, which can skip undesired video segments such as sponsored content.

patches.name: Spoof app version
patches.description: Adds an option to trick YouTube into thinking you are running an older version of the app. This can be used to restore old UI elements and features.

patches.name: Spoof device dimensions
patches.description: Adds an option to spoof the device dimensions which can unlock higher video qualities.

patches.name: Spoof video streams
patches.description: Adds options to spoof the client video streams to fix playback.

patches.name: Spoof video streams
patches.description: Adds options to spoof the client video streams to fix playback.

patches.name: Swipe controls
patches.description: Adds options to enable and configure volume and brightness swipe controls.

patches.name: Theme
patches.description: Adds options for theming and applies a custom background theme (dark background theme defaults to pure black).

options.title: Dark theme background color
options.description: Can be a hex color (#RRGGBB) or a color resource reference.

patches.name: Theme
patches.description: Adds options for theming and applies a custom background theme (dark background theme defaults to pure black).

options.title: Dark theme background color
options.description: Can be a hex color (#RRGGBB) or a color resource reference.

options.title: Light theme background color
options.description: Can be a hex color (#RRGGBB) or a color resource reference.

patches.name: Video ads
patches.description: Adds an option to remove ads in the video player.

patches.name: Video quality
patches.description: Adds options to set default video qualities and always use the advanced video quality menu.
